short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select and inspect elements on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enables users to easily inspect and select elements on any web page. Once an element is selected, the extension displays its associated class names and IDs in a simple and clear interface. No data is stored or savedâ€”this tool is focused solely on providing quick access to CSS information for web developers and designers.(only for developer user who created this)
